examples: Foods like kimchi, sauerkraut, tempeh, and kombucha provide variety and vitality to our diets.
- It looked like fairly standard Korean food, it was variants of kimchi, various sort of, soups and meats and so on.
I got some red onions, some kimchi, and I'll layer that on top of the pork and the chips.
For example, Koreans combined raw cabbage and salt and made kimchi.
It took millions of years for hominins to go from enjoying nature’s own fruit punch to making things like kimchi and beer.
words.defineEn: a hot Korean dish made with pickled cabbage, peppers, etc.
words.defineVi: một món ăn nóng của Hàn Quốc được làm bằng bắp cải muối, ớt, v.v.

words.defineEn: a Korean dish made with mixed rice, vegetables, meat (usually beef), and a fried egg
words.defineVi: một món ăn Hàn Quốc làm từ cơm trộn, rau, thịt (thường là thịt bò) và trứng chiên

words.defineEn: a popular Korean street food dish made with stir-fried rice cakes in a spicy sauce

words.defineEn: a Korean dish made with thinly sliced marinated beef that is grilled or pan-fried
words.defineVi: một món ăn Hàn Quốc làm từ thịt bò ướp thái lát mỏng nướng hoặc áp chảo

examples: In some countries like the Philippines and South Korea, Spam quickly became a part of local dishes like Koreans stew budae jjigae and musubi.

examples: The GUI, I don't like it.
You can now go into the code sort of, and, and tweak things to a degree, that you cannot do with a standard GUI.
(laughing) If you take a look at this GUI, that I designed for them like two years ago, I emailed this to them and they're like, "Well we're not sure what problem this is supposed to solve."

examples: The meal was delicious, but the complimentary dessert was the cherry on the sundae.
After a long day of work, coming home to a hot meal prepared by my spouse was great, and the fact that they had also picked up my favorite dessert was the cherry on top of the sundae.
Buzz bought me an ice cream sundae with USA drawn across it in chocolate syrup.
Because your parents always made you a giant ice cream sundae on days when you were feeling lousy?
